text:
e="preserve">Carlos Burga (12 May 1952 – 18 January 2021) was a Peruvian boxer. He competed in the men's welterweight event at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Burga also competed in the welterweight class at the 1975 Pan American Games.
Burga died on 18 January 2021 from COVID-19 in Lima, Peru at the age of 68.
